name: stripe-layout
description: A simple demo on how to build a website similar to stripe.com

scripts.start: node-sass --include-path scss sass/style.scss dist/css/style.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --include-path scss sass/style.scss dist/css/style.min.css --output-style compressed && autoprefixer-cli -o dist/css/style.css dist/css/style.css && autoprefixer-cli -o dist/css/style.min.css dist/css/style.min.css

author: Justin Conklin
